    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Faerie Queen's Bower](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2395)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Holy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=517" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=280" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 194 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leaf Weave](/Armor.aspx?ID=28)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +23; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision ([darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415)) 60 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet

**Communication** [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=155), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115))

**Skills** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +25, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +25

**Int** +4, **Wis** +4, **Cha** +6

**Will** +25 

</column>

---        

A suit of [_autumn's embrace_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1840) armor can gain sapience when lovingly crafted by a fae monarch of sufficient power; a suit of _faerie queen's bower_ is one such example. The armor is happy to give you and your companions counsel, hoping to guide you on a path of benevolence and aid you in battles against forces that seek to cause harm to the natural world. It refuses access to its magic to anyone who causes undue harm to plants or animals.

 In addition to the features and activation of _autumn's embrace_, _faerie queen's bower_ has the following activation.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The armor casts 4th-rank [_safe passage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=712), with the protected area beginning from your square and extending to a place of relative safety.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Faerie Queen's Bower
